public static String join(String token,

Join a collection of string elements with a given token

Parameters:
token - A string that will work as glue character between elements
objects - all the elements in the collection
Returns:

findFirstMatch

public static <T> T findFirstMatch(com.google.common.base.Predicate<T> predicate,
                                   Collection<T> candidates)
Return the first element in 'candidates' that is complies with a determined Predicate. If no element matches returns null. Iteration order is Collection implementation specific.

Type Parameters:
T - The generic type of the objects contained within the collections.
Parameters:
predicate - The Predicate that applies to the candidates.
candidates - The candidates to search for.
Returns:
Object The first present object, or null if not found.

find

public static <T> T find(Iterable<T> iterable,
                         com.google.common.base.Predicate<? super T> predicate)
Returns the first element in Iterable that satisfies the given predicate, else return null

Type Parameters:
T - The item type
Parameters:
iterable - The Iterable
predicate - The Predicate
Returns:
The element
